TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ViewFields implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._ViewFields

summary.span: 表示集合的视图中的对象。

span.span: Represents the collection of objects in a view.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: ViewFields 集合表示可在视图中显示的 Outlook 项目属性。

span.span: The ViewFields collection represents the Outlook item properties available for display in the view.

para.span: 使用方法添加视图字段中的下列对象派生的ViewFields集合的对象：

span.span: Use the method of the ViewFields collection to add a view field for the following objects derived from the object:

para.span: 在表视图中， ViewField ViewFields 集合中的对象的顺序不是字段的列，在表视图中显示的顺序相同。

span.span: In a table view, the order of ViewField objects in the ViewFields collection is not the same as the order that field columns are displayed in the table view.

para.span: 若要获得所列顺序解决方法是分析返回的字符串属性。

span.span: A workaround to obtain the column order is to parse the string returned by the property.
